awd_titl_txt: Symposium 2000 on Adaptive Systems for Signal Processing, Communications and Control
awd_abstract_narration: Symposium 2000 on Adaptive Systems for Signal Processing, Communications and Control (AS-SPCC) sponsored by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers Canada (Region 7) is seeking a grant toward the cost of conference publications and to partially support graduate student participation.  The symposium is the first International Symposium presenting work in Fundamentals of Adaptive and Learning Systems, Pattern Recognition, Adaptive Signal Processing, Radar Signal Processing, Wireless Communications, Adaptive Control, Nonlinear Dynamical Systems and Computational Intelligence in Finance.  The Symposium is being held in Lake Louise, Alberta, Canada, October 1-4, 2000.  The Symposium site is the Chateau Lake Louise.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division of Computing and Communication Foundations
